trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The stern Hhetsarro has something both pointy and poignant for you to deliver.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the polished horn to the spirited Hhetsarro.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the fresh vegetables.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the fresh vegetables to the stern Hhetsarro.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_000<tab>Hail, traveler. If you're bound for Hhusatahwi, I have a favor to ask.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_001<tab>Could I get you to deliver this polished horn to my sister?
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_002<tab>You'll find her tending the field on the outskirts of town. She shouldn't be hard to recognize─we have the same hair color.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_010<tab>Please make sure that polished horn gets to my sister in Hhusatahwi. Keep an eye out for a Hhetsarro farmer with the same color hair as me.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_LIVELY05139_000_020<tab>Oho, what can I do for you?
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_LIVELY05139_000_021<tab>Ah, this horn... I knew the day would come, but it's sad to think he's no longer with us.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_LIVELY05139_000_022<tab>I appreciate the delivery, nonetheless! I hate to ask any more of you, but there's something I want to give to my sister in return.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_LIVELY05139_000_023<tab>Harvest a handful of vegetables from that plant and take them to her, would you?
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_LIVELY05139_000_024<tab>I know I ought to do it myself, but the crops won't tend themselves... Anyway, tell her that I'll come and visit soon!
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_030<tab>Did you deliver the horn?
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_040<tab>Welcome back, traveler. Ah, but what is that you have there?
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_041<tab>So fresh and plump... These look delicious. Clearly my sister's been hard at work.

TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_042<tab>I suppose you're wondering why I had you deliver that horn. It came from an old rroneek bull that recently passed away. He was our hhetso─one of many creatures we Hhetsarro seek guidance from throughout our lives.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_043<tab>My sister and I─our souls are bound together through that rroneek. So too in death, as much as in life.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_044<tab>One horn I gave to my sister, the other horn I keep with me. It struck me as a fitting symbol of the connection. I'm sure she understood.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_045<tab>She may have moved to Hhusatahwi, but she's still Hhetsarro. Nothing will ever change that.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_046<tab>Anyway, judging by your message, I can expect a visit from her any day now. I should prepare a feast to welcome her back home.
TEXT_KINGZE021_05139_STRICT05139_000_047<tab>Thank you, traveler. We sisters were fortunate to have met you.
